Laine-san?
Nan nan demo nai yo
Seinaru wa owari da
Hora konichi oki naina
Sore yori Antarctica dÅ narana no sa
Nande juu nanka mamotte tabisitte iru kedo...
Anatawa, sono me ni mo kanjita rinjin datta
Jibun no haha wo korosareta riaju de shinjiterarenai
Kotoba ga silencer de natte ireba, jibun no me no ichigenshin desu
Kono me wa honto no me wo meguru koto no taikenjin o kakenuketa riyuu de gotoku
(Translation)
Laine-sama?
It's nothing, really
My back is itching like crazy
I can feel someone staring at my back
What would you think? The antagonist is worse off than myself?
I have a gun with me as I travel around, don't you see?
Those eyes are like evidence of sin from that time, and yet they make me feel alive
I am a murderer who killed a mafia member out of remorse for killing my parents
That's why I was chased out of my hometown by those feelings
This eye shows only what's real, even if it means being shot by a silenced rifle. This is the only way I can truly live.

Please make sure to inspect the JSON file after running the 'Inspect Model' command to confirm that it contains the correct data before proceeding to train the model. ```bash
./run_tasks.sh -f gpt_train --data_path data/gpt --save_path save/gpt \
    --model_name my_custom_gpt --pretrained_checkpoint none --max_seq_length 500 \
    --learning_rate 0.001 --num_layers [2,6,12] --batch_size 8 \
    --epochs [10,20,30] --eval_set dev set --threshold 0.9 --top_p 1 --prompt "$PROMPT" \

    --optimizer adam --clip 0.0 --num_warmup_steps 10 --logging_dir logs --progress_reports 10 --enable_dropout false \
    --seed $RANDOM_SEED --do_save_dev --which_best best --load_best_from last --keep_temp --min_count 1 --share_source --no_cuda --journal_read_interval_hrs $JOURNAL_READ_INTERVAL_HR --attention_log_interval_sec $ATTENTION_LOG_INTERVAL_SEC --save
